item.title: The song of the Springbok mothers
item.summary: What the Springbok mothers sing when they are soothing their Springbok children.
item.comments: 1) See also The Anteater, Springbok, Lynx and Partridge, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-29
item.author: |hanâ‰ kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
